@graph.name: MetaGoFlow metagenomics data products EMOBON00005 for Sampling Event EMOBON_ESC68N_Wa_3
@graph.description:
This is a Research Object Crate containing results data from a MetaGOflow
workflow analysis of metagenomic data derived from European Marine Omics
Biodiversity Observation Network (EMO BON) project operated by the European
Marine Biological Research Centre (EMBRC).

Sampling station: The Arctic University of Norway (UiT)
Sampling country: Norway
Sampling station lat/long: 68.925895:17.125619
Sampling environment: water_column
Sampling station contact name: Kim Praebel
Sampling station contact ORCID id: 0000-0002-0681-1854
Sampling station ENA project number: PRJEB51654

EMO BON reference code: EMOBON00005
EMO BON source material id: EMOBON_ESC68N_Wa_3

MetaGOflow run id: HMNJKDSX3.UDI231
